attributes.action: Age Warning On Book Teaching Sex Tape Tips To Children
attributes.additional_details:
It's All About the Sex Face: A Guide to Becoming a Celebrity was recently featured in the Daily Mail and the Telegraph when a shocked mother found her daughter and friends reading a chapter within this book; which detailed how to make and leak a sex tape to become famous.

We would like to call on other parents to show their support for this petition in the hopes of getting this book and others like it to be made to place an age restriction on it's cover.

The government has done well in monitoring what music and television programs are age appropriate but they fall short when it comes to any form of literature other than top shelf magazines.
